original_text: Since it was customary for the king to consult experts in matters of law and justice, he spoke with the wise men who understood the times
korean_text: 왕이 사례를 아는 현자들에게 묻되 (왕이 규례와 법률을 아는 자에게 묻는 전례가 있는데

sentences.original_text: Since it was customary for the king
to consult experts in matters of law and justice
sentences.korean_translation: 법과 정의의 문제에 대해 전문가와 상의하는 것이

sentences.original_text: he spoke with the wise men
